export_by_product.title: Exports by product
export_by_product.line1: In {{latest_year}}, {{geo.caption}} exported {{trade_volume}} making it the {{rank}} largest exporter in Chile.
export_by_product.line2: During the last {{number_of_years}} years the exports of {{geo.caption}} have {{increased_or_decreased}} at an annualized rate of {{annualized_rate}}, from {{trade_first_year}} in {{first_year}} to {{trade_last_year}} in {{last_year}}.
export_by_product.line3: The most recent exports are led by {{trade_first_product}} which represent {{trade_first_share}} of the total exports of {{geo.caption}}, followed by {{trade_second_product}}, which account for {{trade_second_share}} Top Exported Product in {{latest_year}}

tooltip.to_profile: Click to see the full profile
